 Galvatron and the rest arrived at the base. They walked in and Galvatron was 
now in a very bad mood. he didnt say anything. He just replayed what happened 
on the screen. They never should have even went. It was way too late. He 
would have to upgrade his scanners. He looked at disgust and the horrible 
tactics they had used. So sloppy. He turned to Darkmouse. "Go and get 
repaired. Then I will have another mission for you."  He turned to God 
neptune. "YOu go in the simulator and train." He looked at Guieldart. "How is 
our second plan going?" Guiledart smiled. "Good hes on his way." Galvatron 
had a shimmer of a smile then it faded as fast as it came. He went back to 
the tatics computer and watched to see if any new happening have occured. He 
suddenly reliazed something. "Shredder!" he sent a comm out. "Where in the 
pit are you youve been gone for mega cycles."

--part1_79.1a3208ec.28be5de6_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
